name: GetCustomerSegments
description:
Retrieve segments of a specific customer from Customerio.

Use this tool to get a list of segments that a specified customer profile is a part of. This can be useful for understanding customer categorization and targeting within the Customerio platform.

parameters.name: customer_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the customer for segment retrieval in Customerio.

value_schema.description: The ID of the customer you want to perform an operation against.

parameters.name: customer_id_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of customer identifier to use ('id', 'email', or 'cio_id'). Default is 'id'.

value_schema.description: The type of `customer_id` you want to use to reference a person. If you don't provide this parameter, we assume that the `customer_id` in your request is a person's `id`.
